Código: R/bbs_poptrend.R
bbs_poptrend.Rd

Calculate the population trend based on BBS data

Uso

bbs_poptrend(data = NULL, prop = 1)

Argumentos

data

a list object derived from the bbs_fetch() function

prop

the proportion of observations to fit the population trend model. The lower value can reduce the

Valor

some info here

Ejemplos

bbs_poptrend()
